ygData.subject: Re: Dagnor's Cauldron
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine was grouped with a guide s lesser character for exploring who was very lose tongued about Kedge Keep. They were killing in unrest when my
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine was grouped with a guide's lesser character for exploring
who was very lose tongued about Kedge Keep.
They were killing in unrest when my friend asked if the guide/char knew
anything about the area or about a "rumored" keep under the water. Getting
excited the guide made my friend promise not to tell and then proceeded to
tell him of a cool suit of some kind of magical plate (with some type of
elemental enchantment) as well as a hammer that is supposed to be one of the
ultimate cleric weapons. Im not sure if it is a quest piece for the hammer
or the hammer itself but when my friend tried to ask more about it the guide
shut up real quick.
He was saying it is held/guarded by an undead knight or ghoul knight about
45+ (sk possibly)
the armor is supposed to be light is medium sized and has the elemental
effect (defensive offensive is unknown) after hearing this I thought there
may be a good reason to explore kedge keep. If anyone explores or hears
anything else let me know.... IM thinking about making a cleric just to go
check this out.
